moves.1. e4 e5 2. Nf3 d6: Philldors defence, my least favourite opening as white.
moves.3. d4 f6: Huh? New version I have not heard of.
moves.5... Kxd8 6. Bc4 c6 7. Nc3 b5: Small pawn chain, I guess. Attacking the bishop.
moves.8. Bb3: Escaping the threat and still having the LSB on th a2-g8 diagonal.
moves.19... Nxh3+ 20. Kh2 hxg3+: Aw man! I forgot about the bishop!
moves.25. Kxg4: I think g4 was ghost vision, eyeing Nf2, but the rook is here...
moves.27. b4: Stopping the king from a5 or c5. I was expecting axb3 e.p. But I guess not.
moves.28. Rd1d6: Which falls to a bigger threat of mate.
moves.29. Nd5#: Wow! BOOM CHECKMATE. I win. I thought about this for a while, then realized it was mate!

gameName: Man, that was easy, but hard at the same time!
